sen.j: 袷（あわせ）とは裏地のある和服のこと。
sen.e: The term "awase" means wafuku (traditional Japanese clothes) with a lining.

sen.j: なお、室町時代以後の小袖において「袷」とは綿の入らない裏つきをいい、冬の綿入の小袖と区別することもあった。
sen.e: In the case of kosode (kimono with short sleeves) that has been used since the Muromachi period, "awase" means the one that has a lining without cotton padding, and it is distinguished from a padded kosode for winter use.
